alert.note: Alert for Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jeff Davis and northwestern Appling Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds, wind gusts up to 50 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hazlehurst, Graham, Plant Hatch and Pine Grove. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
